Pre-Game Insights: Suryakumar Yadav takes over as captain from Rohit Sharma
Shubman Gill and Yashasvi Jaiswal expected to anchor the batting lineup
Charith Asalanka appointed as new T20I captain for Sri Lanka
Miscellaneous Highlights: Weather in Pallekele expected to be cloudy and humid with a high probability of thunderstorms
Pitch at Pallekele traditionally favors batsmen, particularly in the evening
Others: Gautam Gambhir faces a wicketkeeper choice between Rishabh Pant and Sanju Samson

India vs Sri Lanka 1st T20 match to be broadcast on Sony Sports Ten 5 and Sony Sports Ten 1 in English, Sony Sports Ten 3 in Hindi, and Sony Sports Ten 4 in Tamil and Telugu. Online streaming of India vs Sri Lanka will be available on Sony LIV app.
